title: I don't know if Riot still does this, but scuttle crab
body:
Okay, so I love the scuttlecrab, I live, breathe, and swim with, scuttle crab, and I already have the icon for it, but my friend, who is not nearly as invested in, but still deeply cares about scuttle crab, also wants the icon, now here's the problem, I'm 19RP away from having enough to gift him the scuttle crab icon, so as is customary, I have drawn riot a piece that I believe is AT LEAST worth 19RP, personally I believe this piece is well worth 1000RP, but that's besides the point, so without further ado, I present to you, the glorious scuttle. (Yes, I know the real name is Rift Scuttler, YOU TAKE ME FOR A HEATHEN?)


http://imgur.com/r9ACyK1
